title: Will insulin make my patient gain weight?
description: All my patients with diabetes should see an ophtalmologist yearly for a dialated eye examination- beginning at diagnosis in people with type 2 diabetes, and after 5 years in people with type 1 diabetes after puberty. Patients with know eye disease, symptoms or blurred vision in one eye, or blind spots may need to see their ophtalmologist more frequently.

comments.commentText: Numbers or tingling in your feet should be reported to your doctor at your regular visits. Numbers or tingling in your feet should be reported to your doctor at your regular visits. Numbers or tingling in your feet should be reported to your doctor at your regular visits.

answers.answerText: You should check your feet daily for redness, caluses, cracks or skin breakdown.
